comments.author: Egii Nna
comments.body: I also have the same thinking because when our fellow Naija brothers and sisters come to the forum, they just see the local board as a newsreader place. Not that we are not discussing bitcoin-related topics, but most of us are engaged in bringing unnecessary news to the community. In this process, many of them spam sometimes, but if we engage more in discussion about bitcoin, many of us will understand because some of us here can’t express our minds using English, but when it comes to pidgin, they will be able to write and also understand more. My view here is that if we can start discussion and creating thread that will be base on bitcoin writing in pidgin it will help more of our members that are in this forum to understand more about bitcoin especially the newcomers they need to have adequate knowledge so that they will not be a victim of breaking and rule of the forum and they should understand more about bitcoin  And we should engage in creating thread like  this one,  to help the newcomers.

comments.author: Kelward
comments.body: Na true you talk we really need more of cryptocurrency related discussions for dis our board, because na im go help new members to de learn and sabi about bitcoin pass. Even for di established members di relevant discussions go also de refresh dem memories about bitcoin, because out of sight na out of mind. Also we go de get new ideas join di ones wey we get, based on say di forum na about bitcoin talk. Person like me wey no get any idea about bitcoin before I join dis forum, na here I start to gradually gain every knowledge of crypto matter wey I know, so if no be plenty bitcoin discussions wey de on ground for me to de join di discussion and learn, I no know where my level for de about bitcoin now. Aldo off topics discussions de OK for our board too, so we go de de informed about oda things wey de happen for our country. But di topics no suppose pass  bitcoin related discussions, so people wey visit di board go know say na bitcoin matter be di koko for here. But I no know di possibilities of getting off topic sub board inside our local board, dat one for make am very convenient, so members go know where to direct any topic go.

comments.author: Truthlovecoins
comments.body: You made a wonderful observation by the way OP, and it is evidently clear that our Bitcoin knowledge including mine is very small. It's not as if the interest to discuss or create topics isn't there, it's just that many of the topics about Bitcoin may have been discussed previously and it becomes hard to dwell on a subject that has long been discussed mostly coming from newbies. Newbies like me learn more of Bitcoin from the beginners and help section and though I know this Naija section is still part of the Bitcointalk forum, it would be confusing to create new topics on Bitcoin with a semblance to what we have read or commented in the beginners and help section.
